project.name: Everything Claude Code
project.tagline: Battle-Tested Claude Code Plugin Configuration Collection
project.description: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin configuration collection from an Anthropic hackathon winner. Provides 9 agents, 14 commands, 8 rules, 11 skills, and 15+ hooks to enhance AI-assisted development efficiency. Supports Windows, macOS, and Linux with cross-platform Node.js scripts.

features.title: Why Everything Claude Code?
features.subtitle: Stop configuring from scratch. Get battle-tested configurations refined over 10+ months of daily use.

list.title: Battle-Tested
list.desc: From an Anthropic hackathon winner, refined over 10+ months of daily use building real products.

list.title: Complete Configuration

list.title: Cross-Platform Support
list.desc: All hooks and scripts rewritten in Node.js. Works seamlessly on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

list.title: Smart Package Manager
list.desc: Auto-detects npm, pnpm, yarn, or bun with 6 priority configurations. Zero manual setup required.

list.title: Continuous Learning

list.title: Code Quality Assurance
list.desc: TDD workflow, code review, and security auditing ensuring 80%+ test coverage.
